entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
